fields.name: CountryOrRegionForHolidays
fields.description:
Country or region for holidays for forecasting tasks.
These should be ISO 3166 two-letter country/region codes, for example 'US' or 'GB'.

fields.name: CvStepSize
fields.description:
Number of periods between the origin time of one CV fold and the next fold. For
example, if `CVStepSize` = 3 for daily data, the origin time for each fold will be
three days apart.

fields.name: FeatureLags
fields.description: Flag for generating lags for the numeric features with 'auto' or null.

fields.name: FeaturesUnknownAtForecastTime
fields.description:
The feature columns that are available for training but unknown at the time of forecast/inference.
If features_unknown_at_forecast_time is not set, it is assumed that all the feature columns in the dataset are known at inference time.

fields.name: ForecastHorizon
fields.description: The desired maximum forecast horizon in units of time-series frequency.

fields.name: Frequency
fields.description: When forecasting, this parameter represents the period with which the forecast is desired, for example daily, weekly, yearly, etc. The forecast frequency is dataset frequency by default.

fields.name: Seasonality
fields.description:
Set time series seasonality as an integer multiple of the series frequency.
If seasonality is set to 'auto', it will be inferred.

fields.name: ShortSeriesHandlingConfig
fields.description: The parameter defining how if AutoML should handle short time series.

fields.name: TargetAggregateFunction
fields.description:
The function to be used to aggregate the time series target column to conform to a user specified frequency.
If the TargetAggregateFunction is set i.e. not 'None', but the freq parameter is not set, the error is raised. The possible target aggregation functions are: "sum", "max", "min" and "mean".

fields.name: TargetLags
fields.description: The number of past periods to lag from the target column.

fields.name: TargetRollingWindowSize
fields.description: The number of past periods used to create a rolling window average of the target column.

fields.name: TimeColumnName
fields.description: The name of the time column. This parameter is required when forecasting to specify the datetime column in the input data used for building the time series and inferring its frequency.

fields.name: TimeSeriesIdColumnNames
fields.description:
The names of columns used to group a timeseries. It can be used to create multiple series.
If grain is not defined, the data set is assumed to be one time-series. This parameter is used with task type forecasting.

fields.name: UseStl
fields.description: Configure STL Decomposition of the time-series target column.
